metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4483 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The xmlBufAttrSerializeTxtContent function in xmlsave.c in libxml2 allowscontext-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-boundsread and application crash) via a non-UTF-8 attribute value, related toserialization.  NOTE: this vulnerability may be a duplicate ofCVE-2016-3627.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4483` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1').
